near0011: I am taking a short break.
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>I had prepared myself that we may have
to live with the sludge for another one
hundred years or so.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>In this instance, I am happy to have so
massively miscalculated. The young ones
have saved us all!
I am, of course, speaking about our brave
King Sidon. However...

My son, Rivan, and my granddaughter,
Dunma, have also become so dependable.
They are like brand-new Zora!
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_01>I cannot allow them to take all of the glory
for themselves! I will train until I return to
form, starting with these legs of mine!
talk0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>It is fortunate that this place survived the
panic surrounding the sludge.

Still, Ledo was quite worked up
about all of the damage. It certainly is
in dire need of repair.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>He was in a rather excited state when he
left to look for materials at East Reservoir
Lake.<sp:5:0:0> I hope he finds what he needs.
talk0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>The stonemason, Ledo, ran all the
way to East Reservoir Lake with such
speed and ease!
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>I cannot allow him to get away with that!<sp:5:1:0>
I must train my legs until I surpass him!
talk0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think_01>You want to know about King Dorephan?<sp:5:1:0>
I believe he left to investigate the sludge.

But I have seen no sign of him in this area
of the domain. If you are looking for him,
seek elsewhere.
talk0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Cleff from the general store is in quite a
bind as well... I must bring back plenty of
splash fruit!
talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Happy_01>Well now... <sp:5:0:0>Your journey here must have
been difficult. Were you not daunted by
the sludge outside?
<sp:3:0:2:0701>We are not presently graced with King
Dorephan's presence, and so we are
making use of the throne room.
The sludge cannot fall in here. It is safe!


<snd:TalkPositive_00>Hurry along!<sp:5:0:0> Take shelter beneath the
safety of this roof for a while!
talk0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>The sludge cannot fall in here. It is safe!
You should rest for a while.
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_01>Great work washing away that nasty
sludge. <sp:5:0:0>Thanks to you, <sp:5:0:0>we are saved.

Now it is my turn to play the hero...<sp:5:0:0>
I am off on a quest to acquire more
splash fruit!
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Angry_01>Lady Yona finds said quest worrisome.<sp:5:0:0>
However, despite how I may appear, I was
once known as the master of the spear!
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL_01>This is the perfect opportunity to retrain
my legs and hips so that all can see I am
still the master of old!
talk0031:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>You may have beaten me to it, but I must
do whatever I can to help the domain!

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS>One must strike while the iron is hot,
and it is currently ablaze! I am heading
out in search of more splash fruit!
talk0032:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>There may be splash fruit still to find,
perhaps where no one has yet ventured.

The road south of the domain is crumbling
due to the Upheaval. The search team
has surely not checked there yet.
talk0033:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>If you want some splash fruit as well,
try stopping by the Coral Reef.
talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Ease>*wheeze* *hack* It seems it is time...
for this warrior...to take a little break.
talk0034:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>There is a mysterious light at
East Reservoir Lake.<sp:5:1:0> I wonder
if Prince Sidon has noticed...
talk0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad_00>Although a new age has dawned...<sp:5:0:0>I have
no plans to retire anytime soon.

<snd:Work_00>It would be shameful for a Zora warrior to
let a silly thing like age stop them.

The older you get, the craftier your spear
movements become.<sp:5:1:0> I have not yet neared
the limits of my abilities!
talk0035:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Tired>Just a little farther...until I finally reach
Mipha Court.

<snd:Work>Oh, back of mine...<sp:5:0:0> I am begging
you...<sp:5:1:0> Please, hold strong until I
reach the prince!
talk0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00>I plan to focus on training my legs and
hips. The trappings of age can go straight
to the depths of eternity, for all I care!
Though I am an elderly soldier, my heart
and my muscles are still young.<sp:5:0:0> I would
not even lose to a 200-year-old hatchling!
talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>All of the splash fruit near the domain
has already been picked...<sp:5:1:0>but there must
be some where no one has yet ventured.
The road on the south side of the domain
has been crumbling due to the Upheaval,
so the search team hasn't checked there.
talk0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL_01>I did it! I acquired splash fruit!


I gave a bunch to Cleff at the general
store.<sp:5:0:0> They should be on his store's
shelf by now.
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>With this,<sp:5:0:0> I am hoping that it will become
easier to take care of everyone!
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>I was concerned about Prince Sidon,<sp:5:0:0> and
so I began climbing upward to go check
on him.
However, now there is a mysterious light
at East Reservoir Lake!

<snd:Sad_00>It is just one odd occurrence after another
these days.
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Oof! My back!


<snd:Work_00>Ahem. I mean, this pain is nothing at all!<sp:5:0:0>
I must go and check on how Prince Sidon
is doing.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I may be far along in years, <sp:5:0:0>but I am still
Trello, the Spear of Justice!<sp:5:0:0> I shall protect
the prince at all costs!
